backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, gallery items, love messages, timeline milestones, surprise config, and dedication with access control and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Machine‑generated feature report mapping project requirements to involved frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entrypoint and setting basic metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all site pages and wraps them in the shared layout.
Generic drag-to-reorder list component supporting item dragging, visual feedback, and reorder callbacks.
frontend/src/components/EditGuard.tsx: Protects edit-only pages by requiring authentication and profile setup, showing login or loading states when needed.
frontend/src/components/editors/Dedicati: Fetches, edits, and saves the final dedication title and message using form inputs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/editors/GalleryE: Manages gallery items with add, delete, reorder, and image upload functionality with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/editors/Interact: Edits interactive surprise config by adding, modifying, and validating quiz questions and flip cards, then saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/editors/LoveMess: Handles creation, editing, deletion, and reordering of love messages with form fields and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/editors/Timeline: Allows adding, deleting, and reordering timeline milestones with date, text fields, and optional photo upload.
frontend/src/components/FlipCard.tsx: Interactive flip-card component showing front/back content using 3D rotation animation.
Image carousel with navigation, captions, and clickable thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/HeartParticles.t: Generates floating animated heart particles positioned randomly.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/LoveQuiz.tsx: Interactive quiz component with scoring, answer feedback, and restart flow.
frontend/src/components/MessageEnvelopeC: Expandable card showing a message preview and full message modal on open.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user for their name and saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: App layout with background pattern, navigation, content slot, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, active highlighting, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseReveal.t: Button that reveals a surprise message with animated icons when clicked.
frontend/src/components/TimelineMileston: Displays a timeline milestone with expandable details and an optional photo, alternating layout based on index.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSurface: Wraps children in a styled card-like container with optional extra class names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity, reinitializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for creating, updating, reordering, and deleting gallery items, love messages, timeline milestones, surprises, and dedications using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider with login, logout, identity loading, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles, gallery items, messages, timeline milestones, surprise configs, and final dedications via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode values, global styles, and custom animation utilities for the app’s romantic design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/EditContentPage.tsx: Renders a protected tabbed interface for editing gallery items, messages, timeline entries, dedications, and surprise content.
frontend/src/pages/FinalDedicationPage.t: Displays the final dedication content with loading state, styled layout, and fallback when no dedication is available.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, animations, divider, and quick link cards to major site sections.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveSurprisePa: Loads interactive surprise config and displays reveal, quiz, and flip-card activities with animations and heart effects.
frontend/src/pages/LoveMessagesPage.tsx: Fetches and sorts love messages, showing them as envelope cards or an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesGalleryPage.t: Retrieves and sorts gallery items, displaying them in a carousel or an empty prompt when no photos are available.
frontend/src/pages/TimelinePage.tsx: Loads and sorts timeline milestones, rendering an animated vertical timeline with milestone items or an empty message.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for the romantic design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versions, features, image requirements, and existing Valentine-themed functionality.
